detail_desc: Calf-length jumpsuit in softly draping satin with a V-neck front and back, narrow shoulder straps and a seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Side pockets, a concealed zip at the back and wide, straight legs. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline. Two printed tops and one in a solid colour.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline. Two printed tops and one in a solid colour.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline. Two printed tops and one in a solid colour.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline. Two printed tops and one in a solid colour.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and a motif on the front. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, a flounce with an overlocked edge at the top and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, a flounce with an overlocked edge at the top and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, a flounce with an overlocked edge at the top and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, a flounce with an overlocked edge at the top and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with gathered tiers to create width in the skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with gathered tiers to create width in the skirt. Unlined.

Set with a long-sleeved dress and pair of coordinated leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Dress with a seam at the hips and gathered flounce at the hem. Ankle-length leggings with an elasticated waist.

Set with a long-sleeved dress and pair of coordinated leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Dress with a seam at the hips and gathered flounce at the hem. Ankle-length leggings with an elasticated waist.
2-piece set with a longer sweatshirt and matching leggings in a cotton blend. Printed sweatshirt with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Patterned leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
2-piece set with a longer sweatshirt and matching leggings in a cotton blend. Printed sweatshirt with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Patterned leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
2-piece set with a longer sweatshirt and matching leggings in a cotton blend. Printed sweatshirt with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Patterned leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
2-piece set with a longer sweatshirt and matching leggings in a cotton blend. Printed sweatshirt with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Patterned leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.

Set with a top and pair of joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Top with a flounce-trimmed yoke, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a top and pair of joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Top with a flounce-trimmed yoke, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a top and pair of joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Top with a flounce-trimmed yoke, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a text print motif on the front.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a text print motif on the front.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a text print motif on the front.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a terry motif on the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front and a wrapover hood. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
Dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front and a wrapover hood. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
Dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front and a wrapover hood. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
Dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front and a wrapover hood. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
Straight-cut sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with a round neck, short dolman sleeves and a rounded hem. One top has a print motif on the front.
Cropped sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Cropped sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams and an elasticated waist.
Top in patterned, fast-drying functional fabric with flatlock seams and glittery elastic at the top. Glittery, double shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Narrow cut at the top and a cut-out section at the back.
Cropped track pants in fast-drying functional fabric. Low waist with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring, a low crotch and tapered legs with contrasting colour piping down the sides and ribbed hems.
Cigarette trousers in linen and viscose twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs with creases.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder and a narrow strap over the other shoulder.
Imitation leather sandals with braided straps and long, narrow straps at the top that tie around the legs. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a flounced trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a flounced trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Elasticated fabric scrunchie.
Elasticated fabric scrunchie.
Elasticated fabric scrunchie.
Plastic smartphone case with real pressed flowers.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles. Rubber soles. Platform 3 cm.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles. Rubber soles. Platform 3 cm.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes. Satin linings and insoles. Heel 0.5 cm.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes. Satin linings and insoles. Heel 0.5 cm.
Straight-cut blouse in a crisp cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Elbow-length puff sleeves with narrow elastication, and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length dungarees in cotton denim with buttons at the sides and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Three-part chest pocket, side and back pockets, and tapered legs.
Ankle-length dungarees in cotton denim with buttons at the sides and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Three-part chest pocket, side and back pockets, and tapered legs.

Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. V-neck at the front and seam with decorative gathers at the top, and short, wide puff sleeves with drawstring hems.

Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. V-neck at the front and seam with decorative gathers at the top, and short, wide puff sleeves with drawstring hems.

Straight-cut blouse in airy, patterned chiffon crêpe with a small frilled collar and opening at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders and smocking at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Straight-cut blouse in airy, patterned chiffon crêpe with a small frilled collar and opening at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders and smocking at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Sleeveless maxi dress in an airy cotton weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, covered buttons at the front and smocking at the back. Gathered seam and a tie belt at the waist and gathered seams with a small frill trim on the skirt. Jersey lining.

Sleeveless maxi dress in a viscose weave with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and an open section with lacing at the back. Concealed zip in one side and a seam at the waist. Unlined.

Sleeveless maxi dress in a viscose weave with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and an open section with lacing at the back. Concealed zip in one side and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Tie-hem shirt in airy linen with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.
Tie-hem shirt in airy linen with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.

Short dress in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon. Wide neckline with a small opening and drawstring at the front, and long sleeves with a flounced trim at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Jersey lining.

Short dress in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon. Wide neckline with a small opening and drawstring at the front, and long sleeves with a flounced trim at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Jersey lining.

Short dress in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon. Wide neckline with a small opening and drawstring at the front, and long sleeves with a flounced trim at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Jersey lining.

Short dress in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon. Wide neckline with a small opening and drawstring at the front, and long sleeves with a flounced trim at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Jersey lining.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with wide elastication at the waist, a zip fly and buttons, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with wide elastication at the waist, a zip fly and buttons, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Trousers in woven fabric with covered elastication at the waist, a zip fly and button, patch pockets at the sides and wide, straight legs.
Trousers in woven fabric with covered elastication at the waist, a zip fly and button, patch pockets at the sides and wide, straight legs.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton velour. Top with long raglan sleeves and press-studs at the back of one shoulder. Twisted side seams and a ribbed jersey trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with elasticated ribbing at the waist and ribbed jersey trims at the hems.

Short, A-line dress in a woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, flounce-trimmed sleeves and laser-cut, hole-patterned scalloped edges around the sleeves and hem. Unlined.

Short, A-line dress in a woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, flounce-trimmed sleeves and laser-cut, hole-patterned scalloped edges around the sleeves and hem. Unlined.

Short dress in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Relaxed fit with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in lightly crinkled jersey with a double-layered frill around the neckline and short puff sleeves with elastication and a double-layered frill trim at the hems. Buttons down the front made of shells that are decorative at the top and functional at the bottom. Elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Calf-length dress in lightly crinkled jersey with a double-layered frill around the neckline and short puff sleeves with elastication and a double-layered frill trim at the hems. Buttons down the front made of shells that are decorative at the top and functional at the bottom. Elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Knee-length, cold shoulder dress in patterned, crinkled chiffon with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and two flounces at the top that continue over the arms. Gathered seam at the waist with narrow elastication and an airy, softly draping skirt with a seam and flounce at the hem. Lined.
Straight-cut top in a stretchy, textured cotton weave with a round neck and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication.
Sleeveless top in a cotton weave with a square neckline and shoulder straps with flounce trims that continue down the front and back. Buttons down the front and wide smocking at the back. Unlined.
